1st.name: GHAOURI Zouhair
1st.title: LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF
1st.intro: From the moment I wrote my first line of code, I discovered a passion for problem-solving and innovation. Over time, I have honed my skills and continue to grow in the field of software engineering.
1st.skills: I'm proficient in technologies such as Python with Django, JavaScript with React.js, and PHP with Laravel, along with a strong command of front-end essentials like HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
1st.interests: My areas of interest lie in Cloud computing, DevOps, and Artificial Intelligence, where I aspire to build solutions that drive efficiency and unlock new possibilities in technology.
1st.projects: Whenever possible, I channel my passion for development into projects, utilizing modern frameworks and tools like React.js to bring ideas to life. I'm driven by a desire to push boundaries, learn continuously, and contribute to the future of technology.
1st.hobbies: Outside of tech, I'm passionate about sports and actively involved in volunteering, which helps me grow personally while giving back to the community.
1st.connect: Feel free to connect with me

2nd.name: GHAOURI Zouhair
2nd.education: I am currently a 2nd-year Software Engineering student at the Moroccan School of Engineering Sciences.
2nd.passion: I am passionate about exploring Web Development, DevOps, and Artificial Intelligence, always looking for opportunities to apply these cutting-edge technologies to real-world problems.
2nd.otherActivities: Apart from coding, here are some activities I enjoy:

activities.volunteering: Volunteering to develop leadership and teamwork skills
activities.hackathons: Participating in Hackathons to hone problem-solving abilities
activities.learning: Continuous Learning through Online Courses and Certifications
activities.communication: Practicing Communication and Collaboration in Team Projects

2nd.quote: Always striving to innovate and create solutions that make a positive impact!

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.laravelDescription: This certificate highlights my deep dive into the Laravel framework and PHP, emphasizing the practical application of these technologies in modern web development. Key learnings include: mastering PHP integration into HTML and server-side scripting, exploring advanced Laravel features like middleware and authentication, acquiring security best practices with CSRF protection, session security, and user input validation, and managing databases through migrations and Eloquent ORM for effective project management.
certificates.softwareEngineeringDescription: This certificate represents my expertise in Software Engineering, focusing on Software Design and Project Management. Throughout this course, I gained essential skills in Software Architecture, Human-Computer Interaction, and Research and Design. Additionally, I developed competencies in Software Testing and Project Management, enabling me to oversee projects efficiently and ensure high-quality software delivery.
certificates.webDevelopmentDescription: This certificate demonstrates my proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Web Developers. In this course, I developed a strong foundation in HTML and CSS, essential for crafting visually appealing and structured web pages. Additionally, I gained practical skills in web development, enabling me to create interactive and dynamic web applications using JavaScript.
certificates.advancedStylingDescription: This certificate in Advanced Styling with Responsive Design highlights my expertise in creating adaptive layouts. I learned to utilize browser tools for responsive design, emphasizing the importance of a 'mobile-first' approach. This course equipped me with the skills to write effective CSS rules for both mobile and large-screen views, enhancing user experience across devices. Key skills gained include HTML, CSS, interactive design, web development, and strategic operations.
certificates.promptEngineeringDescription: This certificate in Prompt Engineering for ChatGPT demonstrates my ability to work effectively with large language models. I learned to apply prompt engineering techniques to harness the powerful capabilities of models like ChatGPT. The course covered the use of prompt patterns and provided insights on creating complex prompt-based applications that can be leveraged in various contexts, including personal use, business, and education.

footer.designer: Designed and Developed by GHAOURI Zouhair

projects.subheading: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

welcomeImmo.title: Welcome Immo
welcomeImmo.description: Welcome Immo revolutionizes the real estate experience with a modern, user-friendly platform. Designed for both real estate professionals and clients in search of their dream homes, it streamlines property management and client communication. Featuring intelligent notifications and an AI-driven chatbot, Welcome Immo makes managing listings and connecting with clients effortless, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable journey in the world of real estate.
features: Efficient property listing and management tools
AI-powered chatbot for seamless admin support
Real-time notification system for both admins and clients
Advanced search and filtering capabilities for a tailored property search

dreamTravel.title: Dream Travel
dreamTravel.description: Dream Travel is the ultimate companion for your adventures! Specifically designed for exploring Marrakech, this app makes discovering tourist attractions, accommodations, and dining options a breeze. With personalized travel suggestions based on your current location and a smart AI chatbot for on-the-go assistance, Dream Travel transforms your journey into an unforgettable experience.
features: Real-time personalized recommendations based on location
Interactive AI chatbot for instant travel guidance
Comprehensive admin dashboard for managing tourist information
Seamless integration with location-based services for tailored experiences

chestXRay.title: Chest X-Ray
chestXRay.description: Chest X-Ray is an innovative application that leverages advanced machine learning to assess chest X-ray images, detecting pneumonia and generating comprehensive health reports. Users can also access a chatbot for medical information, symptoms, and medications.
features: Pneumonia detection from X-ray images
Comprehensive health report generation
Interactive chatbot for medical queries
Doctor search by specialization and location
Data sourced from web scraping for accuracy

rideTogether.title: Ride Together
rideTogether.description: Ride Together is your ultimate solution for seamless carpooling! This web app simplifies the process of booking a vehicle along with its driver, making travel more accessible and convenient for everyone.
features: User-friendly vehicle booking interface
Secure communication between clients and drivers
Efficient management of ride requests and schedules

disneyDataExploration.title: Disney Data Exploration
disneyDataExploration.description: Dive into the enchanting world of Disney through our Exploratory Data Analysis project! By analyzing the Disney dataset, this project uncovers hidden trends and relationships in beloved films and series.
features: Insights into the top categories and directors
Visualizations of actor performance and series rankings
Identification of similar content based on text features
Trend analysis on the focus of Disney's content over the years
